title: Free Health Checkups
description: Basic health screenings including blood pressure, sugar level, and BMI analysis.

title: Doctor Consultation
description: On-site consultations with experienced doctors for various health concerns.

title: Emergency First Aid
description: Immediate medical attention for injuries, burns, and other minor emergencies.

title: Vaccination & Immunization
description: Providing essential vaccines to prevent diseases and ensure community health.

title: Maternal & Child Care
description: Health support for pregnant women, and children including nutritional guidance.

title: Health Awareness & Counseling
description: Educational sessions on disease prevention to promote healthy lifestyles.
